== Elements ==

You can use the `wrap` attribute on the following elements:

  * [PreElement <pre>]
  * [TextareaElement <textarea>]

== Browser compatibility ==

  * In some instances, Internet Explorer and Opera may truncate the contents of a [TextareaElement <textarea>] element when submitted. Using the wrap="virtual" attribute will resolve these issues.
